title: Bug in the new VS event
body: I don't know if this is a bug or not, but after finishing all of my quest for garen. When I launched up the league client it allowed me to pick which side again, now few days ago I got to the same screen and I picked garen again. however, since I got the screen again i picked darius, and surprisingly it gave me all the quest for darius. Is this suppose to happen?

replies.body: Should all be fixed up now, there was a global issue with the extended deadline.
